ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of DAVID H. LAIDLEY of Westmount, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2013, effective March 1, 2010.
